docs.lead_paragraph: Suspected al Qaeda militants opened fired on a Yemeni military checkpoint in the southern province of Abyan on Sunday, a security official and residents said, killing six troops and a civilian.

docs.lead_paragraph: India are confident they can end a string of batting collapses in their second innings and set Australia a competitive target to chase in the second test, batsman Cheteshwar Pujara said on Sunday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Germany planned to close its border with Austria and turn back asylum-seekers in September 2015, a move that could have dramatically changed the course of the European refugee crisis that was at its peak at the time, according to a German newspaper.

headline.print_headline: Turning Point: Germany Hoped to Close Border in 2015, Didn't
headline.main: Turning Point: Germany Hoped to Close Border in 2015, Didn't

docs.lead_paragraph: Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan accused Germany on Sunday of "fascist actions" reminiscent of Nazi times in a growing row over the cancellation of political rallies aimed at drumming up support for him among 1.5 million Turkish citizens in Germany.

headline.print_headline: Turkey's Erdogan Compares German Behavior With Nazi Period

docs.lead_paragraph: Add one more to the list of things dividing left and right in this country: We can't even agree what it means to be an American.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research poll on the national identity of the United States was conducted by NORC from Feb. 16-20. It is based on online and telephone interviews of 1,004 adults who are members of NORC's nationally representative AmeriSpeak panel.
